fields.description:
h3.Feature Request
Expose number of displayed rows in TableView after filtering (using the searchBar)

h6.Purpose
we could determine the number of visible rows in a TableView (after the filtering occurs).
fields.summary: iOS: Expose number of displayed rows in TableView after filtering
